titleStmt.title: Verus Christianus, or, Directions for private devotions and retirements dedicated to ... Gilbert Ld. Arch Bishop of Canterbury ... by David Stokes.
titleStmt.author: Stokes, David, 1591?-1669.
Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. & L. Lichfield for R. Davis,

notesStmt.note: "To which is added by the same author an appendix containing in it some private devotions of the late learned Bishop Andrewes never before extant."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
